name: AJ Fernandez - New World - Puro Especial - Short Churchill
brand: AJ Fernandez, New World, Puro Especial
additionalNotes: New World Puro Especial, an all-Nicaraguan profile handcrafted in Estel√≠, Nicaragua. The medium-bodied puro is available in a handful of classic shapes and is blended from a complex amalgam of tobaccos grown on select Fernandez farms. The shimmering wrapper embraces an earthy profile that delivers rich tasting notes of minerals, pepper, almonds and hickory with a balanced kick. Add a burgeoning boutique brand to your collection with New World Puro Especial.
